name: campanula
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a family of plants with blue, purple, white, or pink bell-shaped flowers: Campanulas, otherwise known as bellflowers, are perennials that will brighten any garden. The rapunzel, after which the fictional character was named, is a species of campanula with delicate violet flowers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe waste ground had been taken over by poppies, geraniums, forget-me-nots, and campanulas.This is a beautiful little lilac campanula that I discovered last year.This particular, deep purple variety of campanula grows in huge numbers in the forests in this area.
